name: Patrol's world
description:
This Game is made for the Quarantine Jam.

Pick up the packages in order to get bombs. With the bombs you can kill the patrols but be careful you can also expode yourself... Kill all the patrols and stay alive to win. If you yell the partols will come to you so use that to your advantage.

Controls:
  1. Left Mouse Click to move
  2. [E] to plan the bomb
  3. [Space] to explode the bomb
  4. [W] to yell
  5. [A] & [D] to switch camera view

Contributors:

  • Bor Zver in Programming
  •  Ilias Paschopoulos in music
  • John Paschopoulos in music
